# General Plugin Info do not edit

base   cli
author Chris P. Jobling; Stephan Chazelas; Andy Webber; schplurtz le déboulonné
email  C.P.Jobling@Swansea.ac.uk, stephane.chazelas@emerson.com, dokuwiki@andywebber.com,
Schplurtz@laposte.net
date   2008-13-02
name   Command Line Interface (CLI) Plugin
desc   Renders transcripts of command line interactions, e.g. for shell and dynamic language interpretor tutorials
url    https://www.dokuwiki.org/plugin:cli
